name: Steel Cushion

desc.0: A supercomputing W-Engine equipped with an enhanced motion monitoring feature, perfectly matching the fast reflexes and combat maneuvers of Cat Thirens. Nekomata has added a foldable knife to its casing. Despite claiming that this design is to facilitate her in battle, the knife has fresh mackerel stains smeared onto it...
desc.2: <ct color=#959595>"Lots of people call me a clever clogs for doing this mod, but when you're out on the streets, you gotta put everything you can to good use: Every little trick, every little thought, every little hustle... And look! A little kitty!" â€” Nekomata, diverting attention away while secretly trying to fish out the listener's wallet</ct>

desc2: Equip to increase Attack Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: A supercomputing W-Engine equipped with a motion monitoring feature. Thanks to Nekomata's modifications, it perfectly matches the fast reflexes and combat maneuvers of feline Thirens.
phaseDescs: Increases <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct>. The equipper's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>25%</ct> when hitting the enemy from behind.
Increases <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>25%</ct>. The equipper's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>31.5%</ct> when hitting the enemy from behind.
Increases <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>30%</ct>. The equipper's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>38%</ct> when hitting the enemy from behind.
Increases <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>35%</ct>. The equipper's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>44%</ct> when hitting the enemy from behind.
Increases <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>40%</ct>. The equipper's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>50%</ct> when hitting the enemy from behind.
